table.title: TCP USB 3.2 Gen 2x1 Type-A Redriver Topology Notes

entry.p: Note1*: Max/ min routing length for USB3.2 Gen1 & 2 speeds (5/ 10 Gbps) depends on redriver performance and its loss compensation capability when used in conjunction with Intel CPU. Work with repeater vendor to ensure the selected part can provide adequate signal integrity at the CPU.
